divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were driving around Hollywood, Ca, and looked up at the sky and saw 3 lights in the sky in the formation of a triangle. Then the two bottom lights moved at the same time and speed apart from each other very slowly. I continued driving.
Summary: 3 bright lights in the sky forming a triangle.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 7 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 31st 2011
